languages.text: "Тот, кто вздумает брать пример с Краанта, закончит свои дни или в одиночке, или как сам Краант. Кстати, его останки все еще надо оттереть с переборки — этим вы и займетесь, когда мы закончим. Вам все ясно?"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Let me see your war face! You've got a war face?

languages.text: "Anyone who thinks of following Kraant's example will end up in solitary or like Kraant himself. Speaking of which, his remains still need to be scrubbed from the bulkhead — you will take care of that when we're done here. Understood?"
languages.original_text: "Тот, кто вздумает брать пример с Краанта, закончит свои дни или в одиночке, или как сам Краант. Кстати, его останки все еще надо оттереть с переборки — этим вы и займетесь, когда мы закончим. Вам все ясно?"

traits.locale_text: "Anyone who thinks of following Kraant's example will end up in solitary or like Kraant himself. Speaking of which, his remains still need to be scrubbed from the bulkhead — you will take care of that when we're done here. Understood?"

"Anyone who thinks of following Kraant's example will end up in solitary or like Kraant himself. Speaking of which, his remains still need to be scrubbed from the bulkhead — you will take care of that when we're done here. Understood?"

"Anyone who thinks of following Kraant's example will end up in solitary or like Kraant himself. Speaking of which, his remains still need to be scrubbed from the bulkhead — you will take care of that when we're done here. Understood?"

languages.text: "Wer Kraants Beispiel folgen möchte, endet in Einzelhaft oder so wie Kraant selbst. Apropos, seine Überreste müssen noch von dem Schott geschrubbt werden – das übernehmt Ihr, sobald wir hier fertig sind. Verstanden?"
languages.original_text: "Anyone who thinks of following Kraant's example will end up in solitary or like Kraant himself. Speaking of which, his remains still need to be scrubbed from the bulkhead — you will take care of that when we're done here. Understood?"

traits.locale_text: "Wer Kraants Beispiel folgen möchte, endet in Einzelhaft oder so wie Kraant selbst. Apropos, seine Überreste müssen noch von dem Schott geschrubbt werden – das übernehmt Ihr, sobald wir hier fertig sind. Verstanden?"

languages.text: « S'il prend l'idée à quelqu'un de suivre l'exemple de Kraant, il finira en l'isolement ou directement comme Kraant. À ce propos, il va falloir nettoyer ce qu'il reste de lui sur la cloison. Vous vous en occuperez quand nous en aurons terminé ici. C'est compris ? »
languages.original_text: "Anyone who thinks of following Kraant's example will end up in solitary or like Kraant himself. Speaking of which, his remains still need to be scrubbed from the bulkhead — you will take care of that when we're done here. Understood?"

traits.locale_text: « S'il prend l'idée à quelqu'un de suivre l'exemple de Kraant, il finira en l'isolement ou directement comme Kraant. À ce propos, il va falloir nettoyer ce qu'il reste de lui sur la cloison. Vous vous en occuperez quand nous en aurons terminé ici. C'est compris ? »

languages.text: “如果有谁胆敢效尤克兰特，立刻抓起来关禁闭，或者让他们落得和克兰特一样的下场。说到这个，他的尸体还没清理干净呢。等这边的事情忙完之后，你立刻负责处理这件事情，听明白了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Anyone who thinks of following Kraant's example will end up in solitary or like Kraant himself. Speaking of which, his remains still need to be scrubbed from the bulkhead — you will take care of that when we're done here. Understood?"

traits.locale_text: “如果有谁胆敢效尤克兰特，会立刻被关禁闭，或者落得和克兰特一样的下场。说到这个，他的尸体还没清理干净呢。等这边的事情忙完之后，你立刻负责处理这件事情，听明白了吗？”

languages.text: 「クラーントの例に従おうとする者は、独房送りになるか、クラーント自身のような末路を迎える。そういえば、彼の残骸はまだ隔壁から拭き取られていないな…ここでの作業が済んだら、やっておいてくれ。わかったか？」
languages.original_text: "Anyone who thinks of following Kraant's example will end up in solitary or like Kraant himself. Speaking of which, his remains still need to be scrubbed from the bulkhead — you will take care of that when we're done here. Understood?"

traits.locale_text: 「クラーントの例に従おうとする者は、孤独になるか、クラーント自身のような末路を迎える。そういえば、彼の残骸はまだ隔壁から始末されていないなーーここでの作業が済んだら、やっておいてくれ。わかったか？」
「クラーントの例に従おうとする者は、孤独になるか、クラーント自身のような末路を迎える。そういえば、彼の残骸はまだ隔壁から始末されていないな…ここでの作業が済んだら、やっておいてくれ。わかったか？」

languages.text: «Quien pretenda seguir el ejemplo de Kraant acabará en una celda aislada, o peor, como el propio Kraant. Por cierto, todavía hay que fregar sus restos de la mampara. Se encargará de eso cuando termine aquí, ¿entendido?».
languages.original_text: "Anyone who thinks of following Kraant's example will end up in solitary or like Kraant himself. Speaking of which, his remains still need to be scrubbed from the bulkhead — you will take care of that when we're done here. Understood?"

traits.locale_text: «Cualquiera que pretenda seguir el ejemplo de Kraant, acabará en una celda aislada, o peor, como el propio Kraant. Por cierto, todavía hay que fregar sus restos de la mampara. Se encargará de eso cuando termine aquí, ¿entendido?».

languages.text: "Kraant'ın izinden gitmeyi düşünenler ya hücreyi boylar ya da sonu onunki gibi olur. Kraant demişken, kalıntılarının bölme panelinden kazınması gerek. Burada işimiz bitince o işle ilgileneceksiniz. Anlaşıldı mı?"
languages.original_text: "Anyone who thinks of following Kraant's example will end up in solitary or like Kraant himself. Speaking of which, his remains still need to be scrubbed from the bulkhead — you will take care of that when we're done here. Understood?"

traits.locale_text: "Kraant'ın izinden gitmeyi düşünenler ya hücreyi boylar ya da sonu onunki gibi olur. Kraant demişken, kalıntılarının bölme panelinden kazınması gerek. Burada işimiz bitince o işle ilgileneceksiniz. Anlaşıldı mı?
